allow: Bash(find "Assets/Prefabs" -type f ( -name "*.prefab" -o -name "*.prefab.meta" ) -exec sh -c 'for file; do git mv ""$file"" ""Assets/_Project/Prefabs/$(basename ""$file"")""; done' sh {} +)
Bash(find "Assets/Prefabs" -type f ( -name "*.mat" -o -name "*.mat.meta" ) -exec sh -c 'for file; do git mv ""$file"" ""Assets/_Project/Materials/$(basename ""$file"")""; done' sh {} +)

Bash(find "Assets/Prefabs" -type f ( -name "*.inputactions" -o -name "*.inputactions.meta" ) -exec sh -c 'for file; do git mv ""$file"" ""Assets/_Project/Settings/$(basename ""$file"")""; done' sh {} +)
Bash(else echo "StreamingAssets not empty or doesn''t exist")

Bash(for dir in _MK ALINE MCP MercuryGraph MetaXR NewGraph-master Oculus PBR_TrafficLightsEU Photon QuickOutline Skybox "Traffic Lights System" Vuplex XR XRI Materials Prefabs Script CompositionLayers Plugins StreamingAssets)
Bash(cmd /c "move EventSystem.cs TrafficEventManager.cs & move EventSystem.cs.meta TrafficEventManager.cs.meta")
